title: Interface MetaTags
description:
Interface representing all possible meta tags that can be used in HTML documents.
This includes standard meta tags, Open Graph tags, Twitter cards, and various other
specialized meta tags for different content types.

properties.name: robots
properties.description: Standard meta tag for controlling search engine crawling and indexing

properties.name: description
properties.description: Brief description of the page content

properties.name: keywords
properties.description: Keywords relevant to the page content

properties.name: generator
properties.description: Software used to generate the page
